name: Section
description: Represents a section in a Word document.

properties.name: body
properties.description: Gets the body object of the section. This does not include the headerfooter and other section metadata.

methods.name: getHeader
methods.description: Gets one of the section's headers.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Required. The type of header to return. This value can be: 'primary', 'firstPage' or 'evenPages'.

methods.name: getFooter
methods.description: Gets one of the section's footers.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Required. The type of footer to return. This value can be: 'primary', 'firstPage' or 'evenPages'.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
